name: AcuteMyocardialInfarction
title: Acute Myocardial Infarction
description: This value set is created for MSSP ACO-38 Risk-Standardized Acute Admission Rates for Patients with Multiple Chronic Conditions measure and represents the chronic condition of acute myocardial infarction.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The chronic conditon of acute myocardial infarction.),(Data Element Scope: Condition, Claim Diagnosis),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD10CM codes for the chronic conditon of acute myocardial infarction.),(Exclusion Criteria: n/a)

Subsequent ST elevation (STEMI) myocardial infarction of other sites
